heavy_feet.name: Inertial Dampeners
heavy_feet.desc: Your base movement speed is reduced by 15%.

brittle_blocks.name: Corrupted Data
brittle_blocks.desc: Data-blocks destroyed by your dash no longer grant nanocoins.

high_stakes.name: Hazard Protocol
high_stakes.desc: All Wealth-Cores are replaced with Spike Traps.

butter_fingers.name: Glitchy Interface
butter_fingers.desc: You have a 50% chance to eject your module when using it.

static_shock.name: Energy Surge
static_shock.desc: Standing on a Conduit tile for too long will overload your suit.
